name: Our illustrious Admin takes a holiday :D
author: HipMaestro

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
For those of you who depend on Kail to keep some sanity among our ramblings, please be informed that he is vacationing (I think that is the correct word though he may claim that he is working ) for about a week though I am not sure of the ETA. Judging from his recent absence (How dare he sneak away like that without even a postcard!) I can only assume he is there now and spending some quality time with the natives. Nonetheless I am sure his thoughts are with us here at the ECB.

Hurry back, Kail! We are growing every day!

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
I'll be back from holyd... work in less than a week now

Take care you all!
